Title: Neighbors from Hell
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), James Wong, Todd Kubrak (executive story editor), Joshua Green (story editor)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Cheyenne Jackson, Billie Lourd
Plot: The community turns on Ally, as she and Ivy are the target of a series of disturbing events; Beverly reports on a serial killer in the area.
